name: Stone Walkers
overview: Stone Walkers is an adventure game in which you take the role of Randy a teacher similar to Indiana Jones and his two girl helpers in a dangerous adventure searching for a mayan artifact called the Jade Mask. The adventure begins when they travel to Guatemala to start the search in some mayan ruins. The game plays like any other adventure game since the player make choices and use objects that will take him to diferents endings depending of the choices he made during the game.
